lines.text: I mean... I can't exactly check whether that statue has tattoos, y'know?
It's a statue. All one color. If it <c=#FF00FF>did</c> have tattoos, they <c=#FF00FF>wouldn't show up.</c>
You think tattoos might be relevant?
Well, it'd tell us <c=#FF00FF>what kind of wizard</c> it's supposed to be, I guess.
Doesn't say much about why it's here, though.
